document_data.name: Jazzomyn Gheldieg
document_data.occupation: Member of the [[Shield Council of Eshpurta]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Jazzomyn Gheldieg''' was a member of the [[Gheldieg]] family and head of the [[Eshpurta]] Gheldiegs, which gave her a seat on the [[Shield Council of Eshpurta|Shield Council]] as of early [[1370 DR|1370 DR, the Year of the Tankard]].. She was the niece of [[Curkon Gheldieg]] (a former [[Namarch]] of the [[Council of Six]]) and the cousin of Lady [[Vyma Gheldieg|Vyma (Gheldieg) Tanislove]], both of [[Athkatla]]. Her ambition was to get her family to increase their share of the art and collectables market.
